languages.text: Вы с каменным лицом съели целое блюдо острых блаберидов, продемонстрировав стальную выдержку.
You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.
languages.original_text: Вы с каменным лицом съели целое блюдо острых блаберидов, продемонстрировав стальную выдержку.

traits.locale_text: You have kept a stony face while eating an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.
You have kept a stony face while eating an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.
You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

languages.text: 辛いブラベリド料理を一皿まるごと平然と平らげ、石のような無表情を崩さなかった。その鋼のごとき冷静さは見事というほかない。
languages.original_text: You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

traits.locale_text: 辛いブラベリド料理を一皿まるごと平然と平らげ、石のような無表情を崩さなかった。その鋼のごとき冷静さは見事というほかない。

languages.text: Koca bir tabak acılı böcek kabuğunu mideye indirirken mimiğin oynamadı. Sinirlerin çelikten olsa gerek.
languages.original_text: You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

traits.locale_text: Koca bir tabak acılı böcek kabuğunu mideye indirirken mimiğin oynamadı. Çelikten sinirlerin var âdeta.

languages.text: Has conseguido mantener una expresión pétrea mientras comías una bandeja entera de blabéridas: una demostración de compostura inquebrantable.
languages.original_text: You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

traits.locale_text: Has conseguido mantener una expresión pétrea mientras comías una bandeja entera de blabéridas: una demostración de compostura inquebrantable.

languages.text: 你面不改色心不跳，吞下了一整盘滚烫的濂贝，展现出了钢铁般的沉着冷静。
languages.original_text: You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

traits.locale_text: 你面不改色心不跳，吞下了一整盘滚烫的濂贝，展现出了钢铁般的沉着冷静。

languages.text: Vous avez réussi à rester impassible tout en engloutissant un plat entier de palourdes bavardeuses épicées, offrant ainsi une belle démonstration de votre mental d'acier.
languages.original_text: You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez réussi à rester impassible tout en engloutissant un plat entier de palourdes bavardeuses épicées, offrant ainsi une belle démonstration de votre mental d'acier.

languages.text: Du hast eine ganze Portion heiße Blaberiden verspeist, ohne eine Miene zu verziehen. Das zeugt von eiserner Selbstbeherrschung.
languages.original_text: You have managed to keep a stony face while downing an entire dish of hot blaberids: a show of steel-hard composure.

traits.locale_text: Du hast eine ganze Portion heiße Blaberiden verspeist, ohne eine Miene zu verziehen. Das zeugt von eiserner Selbstbeherrschung.
